entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.1°C
Wind: WSW 26 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of snow squalls. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
